response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<ImageWriter> it = ImageIO.getImageWritersByMIMEType("image/jpeg").iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;
names.add(it.next().getDefaultWriteParam().getCompressionMode());
}
<<<explanation>>>: You're using Iterator.next() to get the compression mode of the writer in every iteration of your loop. Instead, you should use the value of the writer that you are iterating over. Also, you're not adding the filename to the list, you're adding the compression mode. To add the filename, you should use the getDefaultWriteParam().getCompressionMode() method instead.
